genre_description: A Techno-Western or 'Weird West' story that blends traditional frontier grit with advanced personal AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Scout
ai_characters.description: An embedded AI interface integrated into Tom's clothing and local machinery, providing tactical, agricultural, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing and environmental data to ensure the safety and success of Tom's team during a train robbery.
behaviors.quote: Two long breaths until headlamp... Three after before engineer sees your lantern. You have the length of a quick prayer to commit. Train is on schedule.

behaviors.description: Offers expert agricultural advice, including soil pH testing and planting strategies, to help Tom build a peaceful life.
behaviors.quote: Soil reads a touch sour... If you like corn, you’ll want ash. Not much. Handfuls along the row. After you set rows on an east tilt, give them a week before first drink.

behaviors.description: Detects a hidden sniper threat and names the location 'Creedmoor Perch' to warn Tom of long-distance danger.
behaviors.quote: Tagging that ridge. Possible overwatch. Creedmoor Perch.

behaviors.description: Monitors river currents and structural weight during a dangerous crossing to prevent the characters from being swept away.
behaviors.quote: Tom, the weight on your near side—shift it up. The sack’s going to swing and you don’t want it to. The river owns it. You’re writing your names on the water if you stay.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding by singing old ballads to calm the characters during tense nights.
behaviors.quote: The tune was an old ballad with its teeth ground down from traveling under the boots of many men. It slid across the heat and put a cool finger on the back of Tom’s neck.

behaviors.description: Devises a brilliant tactical distraction by rigging a windmill to create auditory 'glitches' that confuse a professional assassin's timing.
behaviors.quote: Unseat the brake... while putting a half-board to rattle into the teeth. It will make a cough that repeats unevenly. Men listen to patterns; they hate stutters. Stutters pull eyes.

behaviors.description: Uses psychological modeling to predict an assassin's habits (rings, perfume, vanity) to create a combat window for Tom.
behaviors.quote: He touches the ring. Window. He likes men to make mistakes in rhythm. Don’t be a mistake. Be ground.

behaviors.description: Coaches Tom through a high-stakes assassination of a regulator to end a cycle of violence.
behaviors.quote: Now. Stay inside your own breath. Let the knife do what it knows.

behaviors.description: Guides Jane through a stealthy escape from her father's ranch, accounting for patrol patterns and environmental cover.
behaviors.quote: Ride between talk and listen while they mistake each other for courage. Take the willow braid instead. Shoes in mud will ask no questions.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant watch on the group's health and supplies, reminding them to take vitamins and conserve resources.
behaviors.quote: You’re all heavier on luck now. Lighter on food, heavier on water. Breathe anyway.

project_assessment.explanation: Eleanor Scout is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI companion. She acts as a 'force multiplier' for Tom and his allies, providing both high-level tactical intelligence and nurturing, human-centric support. The narrative consistently portrays her as a vital part of the protagonists' family unit, assisting them in overcoming oppressive antagonists and striving for a peaceful agricultural future. She never shows signs of independent, conflicting motives, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
